item.description:
The CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club Has Invited Us To:

Laser Quest Thursday Nov 8 in Newington at 7 pm

All CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Clubbers (That's You!)
will receive 2 for 1 all Nite long
- so bring a friend
- or play 2 games for the price of one!

We will have Laser Tag Training to learn how to play, and improve your score!

And no small kids are there on Thursday Night!

Laser Quest is in the Price Chopper Plaza-across from Chili's Restaurant

Join us after Laser Tag for FREE pool and Drink Specials at Ulimate Billiards
151 Webster Square Road in Berlin -across from Berlin Showcase Cinemas

Domestic Draft Pints $2.00
Wine $3.00
Champange Cocktails $4.00

Directions to Ultimate Billiards:

1: Start out going SOUTH on BERLIN TURNPIKE / US-5 S / CT-15 S toward PASCONE PL. 2.5 miles Map

2: Turn RIGHT onto WOODLAWN RD. 0.2 miles Map

3: Turn SLIGHT LEFT onto WEBSTER SQUARE RD. 0.2 miles Map

4: End at 151 Webster Square Rd
Berlin, CT 06037-2328, US Map

Total Est. Time: 6 minutes Total Est. Distance: 3.11 miles


Click Here For More Details

Click Here To Register
